Corporate Sustainability Program | 2021 Progress Report
Eco-design 
A mixture of pandemic-based disruption and chaotic supply chains constrained 
our eco-design plans in 2021, but we are enthusiastic about 2022. We plan 
to research and publish information about our product lifecycle as a basis for 
making more informed decisions about sustainable product design. 
We also hope to create a deployment framework for eco-design and  
conduct a trial run, selecting some next-generation products for initial review. 
The deliverable will be a process with a realistic timeline and targets.
